com.syntax.code

Interface StyledTextBody.StyledChangeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    StyledTextBody

    public static interface StyledTextBody.StyledChangeListener
    Listen for text changing in StyledTextBody
    See Also:
    StyledTextBody

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void insertStyledText(int start, java.lang.String text, javax.swing.text.AttributeSet attributeSet)
      Listeneing for text inserted to StyledTextBody
      void removeStyledText(int start, int length)
      Listeneing for text removed from StyledTextBody

    • Method Detail

      • insertStyledText

        void insertStyledText(int start,
                      java.lang.String text,
                      javax.swing.text.AttributeSet attributeSet)
               throws javax.swing.text.BadLocationException
        Listeneing for text inserted to StyledTextBody
        Parameters:
        start - the index where the text was inserted. If the location is the head of paragraph, offset will should be 0. If the location is in the end of paragraph, offset should be the length of paragraph
        text - the specified string which is instered to paragraph
        attributeSet - the attribute of text
        Throws:
        javax.swing.text.BadLocationException - if the start out of range

      • removeStyledText

        void removeStyledText(int start,
                      int length)
               throws javax.swing.text.BadLocationException
        Listeneing for text removed from StyledTextBody
        Parameters:
        start - the index where the text was removed. If the first character of text is removed from the head of paragraph, offset should be 0
        length - the length of string which is removed from paragraph
        Throws:
        javax.swing.text.BadLocationException - if the start or length out of range
